# PLAYER::SPECIAL_ABILITY_DEPLETE_METER

## Summary
Depletes the player special ability meter

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **BOOL** ignoreActive
* **INT** abilitySlot = 0

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
p1 was always true.
